snippet.title: Galaga Special Edition for Android
snippet.description: Whether you're yearning for some '80s arcade action or shopping for a new-school top-down shooter, Galaga Special Edition is a disappointment.

snippet.title: Dell Inspiron 17R Special Edition
snippet.description: Dell's Inspiron 17R SE packs reasonably high-end parts into a budget-feeling chassis, saving a few hundred dollars or more over similarly configured laptops.

snippet.title: How to convert FLAC audio files to MP3 with Foobar2000
snippet.description: Converting your FLAC audio files to MP3 is quicker and easier than reripping all of your CDs.

snippet.title: Convert MS Word docs to e-books for free
snippet.description: The Smashwords e-book-publishing service transforms Word's DOC files into the EPUB, MOBI, and other e-book formats, but only if you shun text boxes, tables, and other common formatting elements in the file, as the handy Smashwords guide explains.

snippet.title: Hidden iPhone keyboard symbols and more
snippet.description: The iPhone and iPod Touch keyboard is very versatile and many of its keys offer access to lists of special symbols or more, while tapping and holding certain keys.

snippet.title: Convert images using Preview in OS X
snippet.description: Apple's Preview program can be used to quickly convert any supported image or PDF into one of several formats.

snippet.title: Convert audio to ringtones using OS X Terminal
snippet.description: If you want to use an audio file as a ringtone in iOS, you can use Terminal and iTunes to convert and import tones to your device.

snippet.title: HP Envy 17 Leap Motion Special Edition TouchSmart
snippet.description: HP's new Leap Motion laptop has a built-in motion and fingerprint sensors.
